item.description:
Lets go out to Valentino's in Gloucester for a Murder Mystery Dinner. Someone is going to Die, someone is going to be accused, someone is going to be guilty....who will it be, will it be your meetup buddy or maybe even your Meetup Organizer???? Lets find out.

This is an all you can eat pasta, Meatballs and Salad dinner, the murder mystery and a whole lot of laughs for just $29.95 + cash bar and Tip. But you MUST call and order your ticket right now. Please do not rsvp on the meetup site until you have ordered your ticket, this will give us an accurate count of attendees.

Doors open at 7PM so lets meet at the entrance at 6:45pm so that we can all sit together. If enough members sign up for this event we will call to see if we can get reserved seating. If there are less than 10 paid signups we will not be able to get a reserved seating.

Hope to see you all at the Murder Scene. shock
item.name: Valentino's Murder Mystery Dinner ****ADVANCE TICKETS ONLY*******
